name: Greyhound Manager 2
summary:
In-depth greyhound racing management game. Train, breed and race your own kennel of racing greyhounds in the no.1. greyhound racing game!
Open ended gameplay means you can play endless seasons breeding and racing new dogs and developing your kennels with the aim of topping the rankings! Race in graded races, trial races, hurdle races, handicap races and more. Target the big race series such as the GREYHOUND DERBY and place bet's on the daily races to boost your kennel finances!
